file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-22-03-02 - APU FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE CARTRIDGE - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE CARTRIDGE - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to replace the cartridge of the APU fire extinguishing bottle. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY APU FIRE-EXTINGUISHING-BOTTLE ALL 26-22-03-960-801-A ♦ CARTRIDGE - REPLACEMENT/DISCARD EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-22-03 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-22-03-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. APU FIRE-EXTINGUISHING-BOTTLE CARTRIDGE - REPLACEMENT/DISCARD A. General (1) To replace the cartridge, obey the instructions in Pacific Scientific CMM 26-20-202. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 26-22-01-000-801-A/400 APU FIRE-EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE - REMOVAL AMM TASK 26-22-01-400-801-A/400 APU FIRE-EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE - INSTALLATION Pacific Scientific CMM 26-20-202 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 312 312AR Tail cone compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the tail cone compartment 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Tail cone compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO MATERIAL. (1) Remove the APU fire-extinguishing-bottle ( AMM TASK 26-22-01-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 26-22-03 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Discard APU Fire Extinguishing Bottle Cartridges SUBTASK 960-002-A WARNING: THE CARTRIDGES ARE EXPLOSIVE DEVICES. ACCIDENTAL DETONATION OF A CARTRIDGE CAN CAUSE INJURY. DURING THE TASK, OBEY ALL SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN THE CMM. (1) Remove and discard the cartridge. Refer to the last revision of Pacific Scientific CMM 26-20-202. (2) Install the new cartridge. Refer to the last revision of Pacific Scientific CMM 26-20-202. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the APU fire-extinguishing-bottle ( AMM TASK 26-22-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 26-22-03 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
